name: Focdonz
overview: A wacky Italian climbing game from Roberto Negro, it was translated to English in the 2020 update. Climbing in the United States and the art of climbing skyscrapers. Our friend climbs up trying to avoid everything, as best he can, the colleagues who fall from above, the jars of the mischievous child and the flower pots as well as the cats. Be careful not to leave your hands in the windows. It hurts!
